titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Pacific Improvement Company Payroll book, 1883 JL018
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Processed by Special Collections staff; machine-readable finding aid created by Steven Mandeville-Gamble

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2009-08-03T16:15-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a single item collection constituted by the Pacific Improvement Co. Payroll Book for 1883. The books does not duplicate any information in the related Pacific Improvement Co. Collections (JL001 and JL017). The ledger shows the actual rates of pay, which is difficult to locate elsewhere.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Pacific Improvement Company Payroll book, JL018, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Purchased by Jackson Library of Business, 1972. Transferred to Special Collections, 1979.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.
